content: Komatsu Seiya is a graduate student of computer science at Nara Institute of Science and Technology (NAIST), Internet Architecture and Systems Laboratory. His research interests include Cybersecurity, Network-telescope, Honeypot, Mesh-network and that application. He is a member of IEICE since 2016.
summary: Komatsu Seiya is a graduate student of computer science at Nara Institute of Science and Technology (NAIST), Internet Architecture and Systems Laboratory. His research interests include Cybersecurity, Network-telescope, Honeypot, Mesh-network and that application.
title: Komatsu Seiya

summary: I established a group called "takuma-isec" that study and research about information security at March 31, 2019. We are participating in the incident management contest held by wakyama university, security-camp by IPA and so on.
title: Information-Security Working Group in NIT, Kagawa College
